name: karina baby turban hat
sizes_available: medium preemie, large preemie, 0 - 3 months, 3 - 6 months, 6 - 9 months, 9 - 12 months
notes:
this is a very cute little hat!   
simple but so sweet.

a lovely hat for any baby girl 

requires:
dk yarn (14 - 40g, depending on the size you make) 
4mm needles

sizes:
medium preemie, large preemie, 0 - 3 months, 3 - 6 months, 6 - 9 months, 9 - 12 months

(this pattern is also available in bigger sizes - for a pre-school toddler of 1 – 3 years, a child of around 4 – 7 years, a child of around 8 – 12 years and for teenagers and women)

add a pretty flower, or a big button if you want to  !
